item.title: 英国抵押贷款利率接近两年低点，对英国央行大幅减息的押注上升
item.description: 由于英国央行有望采取重大举措应对唐纳德-特朗普不断升级的全球关税战带来的影响，英国的抵押贷款利率已跌至近两年的低点。【原文：Mortgage rates in the UK have fallen close to a two-year low amid the prospect of a major move by the Bank of England to combat the fallout from Donald Trump’s escalating global tariff war.】

item.title: 贝森特认为债券 "正常去杠杆化"，就人民币问题警告中国
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）淡化了美国国债的抛售，称没有什么系统性问题，并警告中国不要试图通过汇率贬值来报复美国提高关税。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent played down a selloff in US Treasuries, saying that there was nothing systemic at play, and also served warning against China not to attempt to devalue its exchange rate in retaliation for American tariff hikes.】

item.title: 米莱需要大量大豆美元平息阿根廷比索暴跌
item.description: 马塞洛-切尔维尼（Marcelo Cervigni）和成千上万的阿根廷农民一样，正准备迎接一年中的头等大事：大豆收获。对于哈维尔-米莱伊总统来说，这个时机再好不过了，因为他需要大豆装运所带来的数十亿美元来抵消该国不断攀升的外汇赤字。【原文：Marcelo Cervigni, like thousands of Argentine farmers, is getting ready for the main event of the year: the soybean harvest. The timing couldn’t be better for President Javier Milei, who needs the billions of dollars that shipments fetch to offset the country’s spiraling foreign-exchange deficit.】

item.title: 航空公司和托运人趁石油暴跌锁定价格
item.description: 随着原油价格跌破每桶 60 美元，将燃料视为最大支出的消费者正急于锁定供应。【原文：With crude prices plunging below $60 a barrel, consumers who count fuel as their single biggest expense are rushing to lock in supplies.】

item.title: 中国的稀土火箭炮也可能适得其反
item.description:
中国政府对小众金属的限制将带来冲击。但这也将鼓励西方经济体解决技术薄弱环节。【原文：

Beijing’s curbs on niche metals will sting. But they’ll also encourage Western economies to tackle a technological weak spot.

item.title: 反垄断 "险象环生"，科技股风险叠加
item.description: 在大型科技公司目前面临的诸多不利因素中，一个也许是意料之外的因素继续困扰着投资者：华盛顿方面正在采取积极的反垄断姿态。【原文：Among the many headwinds facing big tech these days, a perhaps-unexpected one continues to nag at investors: an aggressive antitrust posture coming out of Washington.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼称欧洲央行现在没有理由降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，欧洲央行应在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对全球贸易大肆抨击所引发的不确定性消除后，再考虑进一步降息。【原文：The European Central Bank should allow uncertainty stoked by US President Donald Trump’s broadside on global trade to clear before considering any further interest-rate cuts, according to Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 三星利用谷歌人工智能推出承诺已久的带视频投影仪的 Ballie 机器人
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）和 Alphabet 公司（Alphabet Inc.【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google are partnering to launch the Ballie, a soccer-ball-shaped home robot that uses artificial intelligence and can project video onto walls.】

item.title: 美债下跌的诸多原因，尽管它是避风港
item.description: 在金融市场动荡时期，美国国债通常是世界上最安全的资产，但最近几天，即使股市暴跌，美国国债也在下跌，这引发了投资者对美国国债的避风港作用是否受到质疑的疑问。【原文：US Treasuries are typically the world’s safest asset during periods of turmoil in financial markets, but in recent days they’ve fallen even as equities tumble, spurring questions from investors about whether their haven role is in doubt.】

item.title: 意大利撤销对意法半导体首席执行官和管理团队的支持
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）表示，意大利政府将撤销对意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV）首席执行官让-马克-谢里（Jean-Marc Chery）及其管理团队的支持。【原文：The Italian government is withdrawing its support for STMicroelectronics NV Chief Executive Officer Jean-Marc Chery and his management team, Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 投资者在代理权争夺战中支持埃利奥特董事会提名人选
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）赢得了一位知名菲利普斯 66 投资者的支持，更换了该炼油公司的部分董事会成员。【原文：Elliott Investment Management has won support from a prominent Phillips 66 investor for replacing some of the oil refiner’s board members.】

item.title: 联想的太阳能笔记本电脑有朝一日可能成为真正的产品
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，长期从事能源报道的记者 Luz Ding 观察了联想的太阳能概念 PC，并发现了其中蕴含的创新潜力。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, longtime energy reporter Luz Ding looks at Lenovo’s solar-powered concept PC and sees the potential for meaningful innovation.】

item.title: 印度批准 74 亿美元购买 26 架法国战斗机的协议
item.description: 印度政府已批准购买 26 架阵风海军陆战队战斗机，这将提升这个南亚国家的国防实力，而印度正将自己打造成印度洋地区抵御中国的堡垒。【原文：The Indian government has approved the purchase of 26 Rafale marine fighter jets, boosting the South Asian nation’s defense credentials at a time it is presenting itself as a bulwark against China in the Indian Ocean region.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平的对峙颠覆全球贸易，双方互不让步
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将美国对中国的关税提高了创纪录的 104%，打赌他能迫使习近平坐到谈判桌前，即使中国政府誓言 "战斗到底"。现在的问题是哪位领导人先倒戈。【原文：President Donald Trump has ramped up US tariffs on China by a record 104%, betting he can force Xi Jinping to the table even as Beijing vows to “fight until the end.” The question now is which leader folds first.】

item.title: 美国最大港口之一担心下一步将出现货运低迷
item.description: 长滩港首席执行官马里奥-科尔德罗（Mario Cordero）在接受彭博电视台采访时警告说，如果目前的贸易不确定性进一步恶化，那么 2025 年下半年长滩港的货运量可能会骤降 20%。【原文：The Port of Long Beach could see cargo volumes plummet by as much as 20% in the second half of 2025 if current trade uncertainties worsen, CEO Mario Cordero warned in an interview with Bloomberg Television.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率降至 10 月以来最低，刺激了需求
item.description: 在贸易战升级后政府债券反弹的刺激下，美国抵押贷款利率跌至 10 月份以来的最低水平，并推动购房申请量创下一年多来的新高。【原文：US mortgage rates fell to the lowest level since October, spurred by a rally in government bonds in the wake of an escalating trade war and driving home purchase applications to a more than one-year high.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 向银行推介如何处理其债券交易
item.description: Citadel Securities 为众多银行处理交易的提议正在幕后成形，重点是固定收益市场的产品。【原文：Citadel Securities’ proposal to process trades for a swath of banks is taking shape behind the scenes, focusing on products across fixed-income markets.】

item.title: 德意志银行认为美联储将在债券市场持续低迷时紧急推出量化宽松政策
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）称，如果美国长期借贷成本短暂突破 5%的颓势持续下去，美联储将需要出手稳定国债市场。【原文：The Federal Reserve will need to step in to stabilize the Treasury market if a rout that briefly propelled the US’s long-term borrowing costs above 5% continues, according to Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.description: 即使美国总统似乎一心想抹杀中国的所有进口，中国也是一个难以改掉的习惯。【原文：China will be a hard habit to kick even for a US president seemingly bent on obliterating all of its imports.】

item.title: 美国关税冲击全球市场，乐高越南新厂开业
item.description: 乐高公司（Lego A/S）对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）向美国贸易伙伴发起的新关税浪潮毫不畏惧，这家全球最大的玩具制造商在越南开设了一个新的生产基地。【原文：Lego A/S is undaunted by the wave of new tariffs President Donald Trump unleashed on US trading partners as the world’s largest toymaker opened a new production complex in Vietnam.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚派遣大型防务公司代表团与乌克兰建立联系

item.title: 12 800 美元的关税打击让一些住宅建筑商盯上了副业
item.description: 2005 年卡特里娜飓风过后，兰斯-托马斯成为新奥尔良的一名房屋建筑商。在随后的几年里，他已经习惯了经济混乱— 从Covid-19到天价保险费，这些都在抑制该地区的住房需求。【原文：Lance Thomas became a homebuilder in New Orleans in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005. item.title: 油价下跌，得克萨斯州野蛮人对特朗普越来越不耐烦
item.description: 在二叠纪盆地石油协会本周举行的 "春季挥杆 "高尔夫球赛上，愤怒的嘀咕声并不全是因为推杆失误或丢球。球道上的德克萨斯州石油商们有一个更严重的问题：他们帮助选出的总统正在压低油价。【原文：The angry mutterings at the Permian Basin Petroleum Association’s “Spring Swing” golf tournament this week weren’t all about missed putts or lost balls. The Texas oilmen on the fairways had a more serious concern: The president they helped elect was tanking oil prices.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省最新欧债销售中缺少美国银行的身影
item.description: 加拿大艾伯塔省在 3 月底出售欧元债券时没有使用美国银行，这打破了该省过去六年出售此类债券的惯例。【原文：The Canadian province of Alberta didn’t use Bank of America when it sold a euro-denominated bond deal in late March, a break from its practice for such sales over the past six years.】

item.title: KKR 同意从 EQT 收购 E45 制造商 Karo Healthcare
item.description: KKR & Co.同意从 EQT AB 收购瑞典消费者保健公司 Karo Healthcare，一反美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发动贸易战后全球交易的低迷情绪。【原文：KKR & Co. agreed to acquire Swedish consumer-health company Karo Healthcare from EQT AB, defying the downbeat sentiment around dealmaking globally after US President Donald Trump unveiled his trade war.】

item.title: 津巴布韦发行美元债券支付前农民的土地征用款
item.description: 津巴布韦发行了价值 3.08 亿美元的国债，并向 25 年前在国家支持的土地改革计划下被剥夺财产的白人农民支付了小额现金。【原文：Zimbabwe issued treasury bonds worth $308 million and made small cash payments to White farmers who were dispossessed of their property 25 years ago under a state-backed land reform program.】
